author: David Sherfinski
title: FAUCI: Americans could eventually carry certificates of immunity...
description: FAUCI: Americans could eventually carry certificates of immunity... (Top headline, 16th story, link ) Related stories: Economic devastation looms on a Good Friday like no other... How America was hit with COVID-19 from two continents... Poop study shows virus…
content:
Dr. Anthony Fauci on Friday said it’s possible that Americans could eventually carry around certificates of immunity to the coronavirus once proper testing is widespread enough.
“That’s possible,” Dr. Fauci, director of the National Institute of Allergy and … [+1383 chars]
